effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.platinum: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. It may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.platinum: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. It may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. It may also leave the target with a burn.
